Package algorithm

Class CycleFinder

java.lang.Object
algorithm.CycleFinder
public class CycleFinder extends Object
Class for finding cycles in a given custom graph.

  • Method Details

    • equals

      static boolean equals(List<Integer> firstCycle, List<Integer> secondCycle)
      Checks if a cycle is equal to another in order to keep repeating cycles out of the final list.
      Parameters:
      firstCycle - first cycle to be compared
      secondCycle - second cycle to be compared
      Returns:
      true if the cycles are equal, false otherwise

    • smallestNode

      static int smallestNode(List<Integer> path)
      Finds the smallest node in a graph (refering to its actual node value)
      Parameters:
      path - path to extract the smallest node from
      Returns:
      the smallest node in the path

    • visited

      static boolean visited(Integer nodeToCheck, List<Integer> path)
      Checks if a given node has been visited in the current finding sequence
      Parameters:
      nodeToCheck - node to be checked for being visited
      path - path that would include the node
      Returns:
      true if the node has been visited, false otherwise

    • normalizePath

      static List<Integer> normalizePath(List<Integer> path)
      Normalizes a given cycle (path) to ensure adjacency is respected
      Parameters:
      path - given path to normalize
      Returns:
      normalized path, returned as a List of Integer

    • invertPath

      static List<Integer> invertPath(List<Integer> path)
      Inverts a cycle such that the generated cycle will have respect to the route defined in the map
      Parameters:
      path - path to be inverted
      Returns:
      inverted path, in the form of a List of Integer

    • isNew

      boolean isNew(List<Integer> path)
      Checks if a cycle is new or has been previously generated
      Parameters:
      path - given path to check for repetition
      Returns:
      true if the cycle has been previously generated, false otherwise

    • findNewCycles

      void findNewCycles(List<Integer> path)
      Recursive algorithm that finds a cycle from a given start node, and continues by using partial cycles
      Parameters:
      path - initial node (after recursion it becomes a partial cycle)

    • buildGraph

      public void buildGraph(Graph inputGraph)
      Initializes the graph by adding the proper adjacencies
      Parameters:
      inputGraph - input graph used to generate the graph attribute

    • getAllCycles

      public List<List<Integer>> getAllCycles()
      Calls findNewCycles() for every two adjacent nodes in the graph
      Returns:
      a List of Lists of Integers that contains all the cycles found in the graph
